description: Try our easy to follow Effortless Bulgogi Beef Bowls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice bowl,Seafood free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Beef,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Rice
name: Effortless Bulgogi Beef Bowls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large wok and batch cook the Bulgogi beef as per the packet instructions. Avoid overcrowding the pan. Remove and set beef aside and keep warm.
Toss the rainbow vegetables in lime juice in a bowl. Heat vegetable oil in the wok and stir-fry vegetables for 4 minutes.
Microwave the rice as per the packet instructions.
Assemble bowls with rice, vegetables, beef, slices of avocado and finish with sesame seeds.
